name: ai-controller
description: Meta-controller for chaining requests across Ex Nihilo modules

scripts.predev: bash -c "SKIP_PORT_CHECK=1 ../../AIDeveloper/scripts/ensure-services.sh && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaning up existing processes...' && (lsof -ti:3035 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && (lsof -ti:5174 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && sleep 2 && echo 'âœ… Ports cleared'"
scripts.prestart: bash -c "SKIP_PORT_CHECK=1 ../../AIDeveloper/scripts/ensure-services.sh && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaning up port 3035...' && (lsof -ti:3035 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && sleep 1 && echo 'âœ… Port cleared'"
scripts.stop: (lsof -ti:3035 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && (lsof -ti:5174 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && echo 'âœ… Services stopped'
